subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Tommy Haas, a 34-year-old wild card, defeated the five-time champion Roger Federer, 7-6 (5), 6-4, to win the Gerry Weber Open in Halle, Germany.
snippet: Tommy Haas, a 34-year-old wild card, defeated the five-time champion Roger Federer, 7-6 (5), 6-4, to win the Gerry Weber Open in Halle, Germany.
